old:
ファイターは盾による防御を反撃の
起点として使うことができます

　敵の攻撃に合わせて【<KC WEAPON_SUB>】盾弾き

他にも、仲間を打ち上げる連携技も可能です
　
　【<KC CATAPULT>】連係投げ
new:
Fighters can use shields as a starting point for counterattacks to defend against enemy attacks.

Deflect attacks from enemies with <KC WEAPON_SUB>.

They can also use combination techniques to launch their allies into the air.

Perform a <KC CATAPULT> linking throw.
